mapper.sql: id, pid, serialNo, billNo, proposalCode, projectCode, projectName, num, medicalPrice, ruleName, deductPrice, deductReason, repaymentReason, doctorName, deptCode, deptName, enterHospitalDate,enterHospitalDateStr, outHospitalDate,outHospitalDateStr, costDate,costDateStr, hospitalizedNo, treatmentMode, settlementDate,settlementDateStr, personalNo, insuredName, cardNumber, areaName, versionNumber, backAppeal, typeno,insuredType,dataType,orderNumber,orderNum,orderSettlementNum, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM yb_reconsider_apply_data where pid = #{pid} and typeno = #{typeno} and dataType = #{dataType} and orderSettlementNum between #{startNum} and #{endNum} ORDER BY orderNum
SELECT * FROM yb_reconsider_apply_data where pid = #{pid} and typeno = #{typeno} and dataType = #{dataType} and state = 1 and orderSettlementNum between #{startNum} and #{endNum} ORDER BY orderNum

SELECT * FROM yb_reconsider_apply_data where pid = #{pid} and typeno = #{typeno} and dataType = #{dataType} and id not in( select applyDataId from yb_reconsider_inpatientfees where applyDateStr = #{applyDateStr} and typeno = #{typeno} and dataType = #{dataType} and areaType = #{areaType} ) ORDER BY orderNum

SELECT count(1) FROM yb_reconsider_apply_data where pid = #{pid} and typeno = #{typeno} and dataType = #{dataType} and id not in( select applyDataId from yb_reconsider_inpatientfees where applyDateStr = #{applyDateStr} and typeno = #{typeno} and dataType = #{dataType} and areaType = #{areaType} )
